item.title: LaTex in Word
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic LaTeX equations to get started using LaTeX equation in Microsoft Word.

item.title: VBA Made Easy
item.description: I started a new job in 2020. Little did I know that this would spend me spyrolling into learning many programming languages. wow was I wrong!

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support

item.title: Steel Helper
item.description:
Starting my Steel class, I could tell immediately that the problems in this class had lots of opportunity to be programmed due to the reliance on code. This means that any cutting back on referring to the code book can be very beneficial.

This was dope because…
